markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1871) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=44)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1867); master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition

</column>

---

You gain the [expert spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).

<title level="2">Expert Witch Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1872)
name: Expert Witch Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Witch Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
